00184    // Inline methods 
00185 
00186    /*
00187    * Get a uniform double precision number.
00188    */
00189    inline double Random::uniform()
00190    {
00191       // Divide 32 bit integer engine output by 2^32
00192       return static_cast<double>(engine_()) * (1.0/ 4294967296.0); 
00193    }
00194  
00195    /*
00196    * Get a uniform double precision number.
00197    */
00198    inline double Random::uniform(double range1, double range2)
00199    {
00200       // Divide 32 bit integer engine output by 2^32
00201       double frac = static_cast<double>(engine_()) * (1.0/ 4294967296.0); 
00202       return range1 + (range2 - range1)*frac; 
00203    }
00204  
00205    /* 
00206    * Return a random long integer x uniformly distributed in range1 <= x < range2.
00207    *
00208    * Parameters range1 and range2 must be within the range of long integers.
00209    */
00210    inline long Random::uniformInt(long range1, long range2) {
00211       double x = uniform(range1, range2);
00212       return long(x);
00213    }
00214    
00215    /* 
00216    * Choose one of several outcomes with a specified set of probabilities.
00217    *
00218    * Precondition: Elements of probability array must add to 1.0
00219    *
00220    * \param probability[] array of probabilities, for indices 0,...,size-1
00221    * \param size          number of options
00222    */
00223    inline long Random::drawFrom(double probability[], long size) {
00224       double roulette = uniform();
00225       long   n=0;
00226       double cumProb = probability[0];
00227       while ( cumProb < roulette && n < size ) {
00228          ++n;
00229          cumProb += probability[n];
00230       }
00231       return(n);
00232    }
00233    
00234    /*
00235    * Get random point within a rectangular prism.
00236    */
00237    inline void Random::getPoint(double minR[], double maxR[], double r[]) {
00238       r[0] = uniform(minR[0], maxR[0]);
00239       r[1] = uniform(minR[1], maxR[1]);
00240       r[2] = uniform(minR[2], maxR[2]);
00241    }
00242    
00243    /* 
00244    * Metropolis criteria for whether to accept a MC move.
00245    */
00246    inline bool Random::metropolis(double ratio)
00247    {
00248       if ( ratio > 1.0 ) {
00249          return true;
00250       } else {
00251          double ran = uniform();
00252          if ( ran < ratio ) {
00253             return true;
00254          } else {
00255             return false;
00256          }
00257       }
00258    }
00259 
00260    /* 
00261    * Returns value of random seed (private member variable idum)
00262    */
00263    inline long Random::seed() 
00264    {  return seed_; }

00266 }
